successes.title: runScribe: Wearable for the Data-Driven Athlete
successes.description: runScribe provides a 3D view of how you run. With your support, we can help athletes run smarter, longer, and with fewer injuries.

Pledges.description: Help us make running better and get access to our product updates!
You get 1 runScribe Starter pack with access to limited metrics.
runScribe Early Adopter - be the first to get runScribe. You get 1 runScribe Pro pack with access to all our advanced metrics.
You get 1 runScribe Pro pack with access to all our advanced metrics.
You already know you want simultaneous right and left data - get 2 runScribe Pro packs with access to all our advanced metrics.
Are you a true data geek? Do you want to do something other than run?  Can you handle all this data?  Then you need the runScribe Science pack.
We've gotten a number of requests from teams, so have created the runScribe Team Pack level.  You get 10 runScribe Pro packs along with 10 accounts.

Be a runScribe sponsor.  You'll be the first to receive your runScribe Pro. You'll run with Tim & John in either Colorado or the SF Bay Area.  Then review your runScore followed by dinner at a local brewery!
